titleStmt.title: Three godlie and fruitful sermons; the two first preached by Maister Iohn Dod: the last by Maister Robert Cleauer. Whereunto are annexed, fiue propositions, or points of doctrine, comprehended in three other sermons, by the same author
titleStmt.author: Dod, John, 1549?-1645.
Cleaver, Robert, 1561 or 2-ca. 1625. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by N. Okes and F. Kingston] for William Welby, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the white Swan,

notesStmt.note: The first sermon is on Zach. xii. 10-14.
Printers' names from STC; Okes printed quires A-O, Kingston printed the rest.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
